nodes.text: Star Wars Galactic Storybook is a hardcover young-reader storybook collection. The book features six stories based on the Star Wars saga, all written by Calliope Glass and illustrated by Katie Cook. It was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on January 5, 2021.
With six stories from a galaxy far, far away, this treasury features adorable illustrations by Katie Cook on every page, stained edges, and a soft padded cover.
